description: As part of Best Buy's Black Friday sale, space and sci-fi enthusiasts can get a pretty unique Lego set for its lowest price yet. Lego Ideas: Tales of the Space Age is discounted to only $35 (was $50). Amazon is matching the 30% discount, so you have two opportunities to snag this 688-piece Lego set before it's gone.
title: Lego Tales Of The Space Age Model Kit Is Only $35 For Black Friday

description:
When the Fortnite Chapter 5 and Remix Finale event takes the stage in-game on November 30, it will feature a pack of four iconic musical artists: Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Ice Spice, and Juice WRLD. Like previous in-game concerts, such as those starring Travis Scott and Ariana Grande, the event is likely to be a kaleidoscopic audiovisual roller coaster. Still, by including the late Juice WRLD, who passed away in 2019, this in-game concert will also be decidedly different from any before seen in Fortnite: It will be the first to use an artist's likeness posthumously, something that Hollywood is also grappling with as of late.

GameSpot recently spoke to Nate Nanzer, Epic's head of global partnerships, in a music-focused in
title: Why Epic Is Bringing The Late Juice WRLD To Fortnite
Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Drops To Lowest Price Yet For Black Friday
Lord Of The Rings 4K Blu-Ray Box Set Gets Huge Price Cut For Black Friday

description:
As it has done each December for the past three years, Fortnite is about to usher in a whole new chapter with a whole new battle royale map, a new loot pool, and piles of new collaborations. But before Chapter 6 can begin, we have to bring the current chapter to a close with a live event on November 30. And this one looks like it'll be a doozy, with a massive concert featuring Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Ice Spice, and Juice WRLD, as well as a slate of new cosmetics paying tribute to the late rapper--including a free skin that anyone can get just for logging in.

As has been the case with the finales for past chapters, this live event will occur on a Saturday, followed by downtime and maintenance in the evening and a new chapter launch on Sunday morning. The Remix Finale is scheduled for 2 pm ET / 11 am PT on November 30, with a possible encore after. And unlike the last few events, the Remix Finale will not take place during rounds of battle royale--it will actually have its own sep
title: How To Watch The Fortnite Remix Finale Event Featuring Juice WRLD

description: Playing the first two hours of Avowed emphasizes how much there is to see and do in the Living Lands, and how much freedom you'll have in making your way through them.
title: Avowed Is Full Of Discoveries And The Freedom To Find Them, Or Not - GameSpot Preview

description: Black Friday 2024 has officially kicked off, and while the deals for this year's biggest shopping event are rolling in, we've already spotted some standout discounts on the Xbox Series X console and fan-favorite Xbox Wireless Controllers. If you've been keen to upgrade your gaming setup, but don't quite have the budget, now is your time to strike. The Xbox Series X 1TB Carbon Black will bring some serious firepower to your kit. With lightning-fast load times, up to 120 FPS gameplay, and exclusive perks like Quick Resume and Xbox Velocity Architecture, it's a powerhouse designed to take your gaming to the next level.
title: Black Friday 2024 – Huge Savings on the Xbox Series X and Controllers

description: Best Buy’s Black Friday event is officially here, and it’s slashing prices on dozens of digital Switch games. Many of these are also on sale on the official Nintendo eShop, but buying from Best Buy is the better option as you’ll get the full Gold Points for your purchase, whereas the eShop gives you an amount based on the discounted price. That means Best Buy is the best place to shop for digital Switch games this Black Friday, and there are some great options to choose from.
title: Tons Of Digital Switch Games Are Discounted For Black Friday

description:
Few video game developers have had to deal with the things that GSC Game World had to face while making Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl. The Ukrainian game developer behind this first-person shooter survival-horror title was derailed by Russia's invasion of its country in 2022. But the game was finally released earlier this month with some noticeable issues. Fortunately, a day-one patch has reportedly dealt with some of those problems, while others remain.

As noted by Eurogamer and Digital Foundry, the patch arrived after reviewers had already played through Stalker 2. The good news is that this patch seems to have significantly helped the game's frame-rate performance. But the site notes that "the game still suffers from everything to minor, amusing bugs to more serious issues and hea
title: Stalker 2 Gets Day-One Patch Improvements, But Problems Remain Across PC And Xbox

description:
It's a perfect time for Iron Wolves to be thankful as Destiny 2's Iron Banner event will make its return next week. The Iron Banner usually brings along new weapons and ornaments, and this event will be no different as it introduces both a new armor set and rocket sidearm into the the loot pool.

On Bungie's This Week In Destiny announcements, the name of the armor set was revealed--Iron Intent--with pieces "worthy of Weyloran, Nirwen, and Orewig" themselves. Players will know those names as great Iron Lords, who've all had weapons and ornaments named after them throughout the years. The Iron Banner will return to the game starting on November 26, with the match type of Control for the first week.
title: Destiny 2's Iron Banner Returns Soon With A Brand-New Armor Set And Rocket Sidearm

description: Xbox Series X and Series S Black Friday deals are available now at select major retailers. Multiple Xbox console models are up for grabs for $50 off. Most notably, you can get the recently released Xbox Series X All-Digital 1TB console for $400 and Xbox Series S for $249. We've rounded up the best Xbox Series X|S Black Friday deals below. In addition to the consoles, you can save big on Xbox Expansion Cards and take advantage of a terrific
title: The New Xbox Series X Digital Console Is Discounted For Black Friday

description:
When Conan O'Brien was still hosting a talk show on TBS, Clueless Gamer was a regular feature. While O'Brien hasn't made many episodes since the end of Conan, Clueless Gamer returned this week with a new installment that tackles the director's cut of Death Stranding, a game that actually features O'Brien in a cameo role.

Aaron Bleyaert reunited with O'Brien for the segment, and he proceeded to explain the lore of Hideo Kojima's game
title: Conan O'Brien's Clueless Gamer Returns To Take On A Game He's Already In

description:
A new update has arrived to both Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 And Warzone. The November 21 patch notes reveal more details of the new Hit List event, and Rebirth Island is finally back in Warzone after its initial short-lived return.

Call of Duty's Hit List limited-time event is now live in Black Ops 6 and Warzone, giving players a list of challenges to complete for new rewards. The Hit List rewards includes Season 1's new drill melee weapon and multiplayer's new Shadow perk.

The update refreshes Black Ops 6's multiplayer to br
title: CoD: Black Ops 6 And Warzone Patch Notes Detail Hit List Event And Rebirth Island's Return

description:
Apollo Justice has a long and storied career on handheld platforms, and earlier this year he made the jump to consoles with Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy. The collection pulls together his best courtroom battles--and for Black Friday, it’s now available on Switch for $30 (was $50). That's its lowest price ever, making it a great time to finally add the quirky narrative adventure to your library.

See at Amazon

Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy features
title: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy Hits Lowest Price Ever For Black Friday

description:
As you venture forth in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, you'll stumble upon strange curiosities known as anomalies. While they might be mystifying at a glance, they can and will kill your character if you're not careful. However, getting close enough can also be a rewarding endeavor, especially if your handheld device can pinpoint the location of goodies. Here's our guide on the best artifact detectors in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl.

What are the best artifact detectors in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl?

The Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl artifact detectors come in different variants. Right-clicking on a device in your inventory allows you to equip it. Then, pressing the "7" key or corresponding gamepad button causes your chara
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Best Artifact Detectors

description:
Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl takes you back to the Exclusion Zone, where your character, Skif, has to tackle challenges, such as handling fractured groups, deadly anomalies, and even more sinister plots. Still, all journeys must come to an end, and you might be wondering how much time you're expected to invest in the game. Here's our guide on how long it takes to beat Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl. We also discuss the game's main mission list and why the campaign can take a while to beat.

How long is Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Campaign length and mission list guide

Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl has a massive, open-world landscape, several times larger than what was seen in the original trilogy. As such, it takes r
title: How Long Is Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl?

description:
Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl is set in the Exclusion Zone, the site of a nuclear disaster and another incident that's equally mysterious. Years after the original trilogy, the Zone is still teeming with life, as survivors plumb deeper into its secrets and battle for total control. As a relative newcomer named Skif, you have to figure out how to assist those in need, while also avoiding dangers that dot the unforgiving wasteland. We've got a Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl guides hub with several articles to help you on your journey.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl guides hub
    • General mechanics and info
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Guides Hub

description:
Journeying in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl can be an arduous task, but there's countless loot to be found to aid you in your efforts against hostile forces and an even deadlier environment. One of these is your final reward for a quest that takes you all the way to an unforgettable location. Here's our guide on where to find the Prypiat Journalist Stash in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl. Likewise, please be reminded that this article contains spoilers.

Where to find the Journalist Stash in Prypiat in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl

The Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl Prypiat Journalist Stash can only be obtained fairly close to the end of the campaign. But, before that, you need to make sure that you've acquired all other
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Prypiat Secret Journalist Stash Guide

description: Black Friday has kicked off early this month, and if you're looking for a deal on headsets and earbuds, you can pick up a set of Apple Airpods Pro 2 for $160. This is the lowest price ever for these--previously, it was $170 during Prime Day in July--as they normally retail for $250.
title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 Drop To Their Lowest Price For Black Friday

description:
The Dreamlight Valley recipes list grows longer with every update. In Disney Dreamlight Valley, you will need to grow crops and forage for food as part of your ongoing adventure in the Valley. Once you have gathered plenty of different ingredients, you will likely want to try your hand at cooking up some delicious meals. Cooking can make your crops worth more to sell or can even be gifted to the various characters around the Valley to improve your friendship with them.

Early in the game, you will be introduced to the concept of recipe books, which will teach you how to make a single dish. While this happens infrequently throughout the game, you can also learn how to cook new recipes by just trying things. If you put the correct ingredients in the pot, you will create a new dish and unlock
title: Disney Dreamlight Valley Recipes List

description: We've spread our search across multiple Zelda games, this time we show a musical secret behinds Nott's song in Breath of the Wild, a wide variety of naming conventions across the newest Zelda games, and how to instantly kill a Lynel in Echoes of Wisdom.
title: 21 MORE Things You STILL Didn't Know In The Zelda Series

description:
Dragon Age: The Veilguard continues to receive support from developer BioWare with several bug fixes and quality-of-life changes. The third patch, released on November 21 for PC and consoles, improves photo mode, input mappings, and some visual elements.

For the photographers out there, there are now filters available in photo mode. Plus, screenshot file names have been simplified and show the date the photo was taken, and the file path where screenshots are saved is now shown in game, which is especially useful for PC users.

As for other quality-of-life changes, arrow keys can no
title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard's Latest Patch Improves Photo Mode, Adds Arrow-Keys Support

description:
Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 developer Saber Interactive is planning to prohibit the use of custom mods in the game's online public matches, as it says they are contributing to a "non-negligible amount of recent server stability issues."

Come the game's next big update in December, players using mods will no longer be able to matchmake with other players in the game's PvE Operations mode or PvP Eternal War modes. Mods will still be usable in private Operations lobbies. Once custom Eternal War lobbies are added, mods will be allowed there as well.

In a message posted to Steam, game director Dmitriy Grigorenko made clear Saber loves mods and the community's creativity, calling them "great" and that they will "no doubt contribute to this game's longevity."
title: Space Marine 2's Next Big Update Will Ban Mods In Public Matches To Help Server Stability

description:
The end of Fortnite Remix Chapter 2 is quickly approaching, and Epic Games has revealed a star-studded concert to close out the season. Fortnite's Remix: The Finale concert features Snoop Dogg, Eminem, and Ice Spice, as well as a tribute to the late rapper Juice WRLD. Players can also earn a Juice WRLD skin and other cosmetics for a limited time.

The Remix: The Finale takes over Fortnite's battle-royale island on November 30 starting at 11 AM PT / 2 PM ET. Epic Games described the experience as an "in-game concert event that connects dreamscapes" with Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Ice Spice, and Juice WRLD. The concert includes a new single from Snoop Dogg called "Another Part Of Me (feat. Sting)", as well as the exclusive world premiere of an all-new Juice WRLD track called "Empty Out Your Pockets."

The developer suggests that players login early on November 30 to queue for the event, but also
title: Fortnite Remix Finale Features Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Ice Spice, And Juice WRLD Tribute

description: Early Black Friday deals are here, but if you're a resident of the DC Universe, then prepare yourself for some Bat Friday specials instead. For many Batman fans, there was the first golden age of films starring the Caped Crusader that began in 1989 and ended in 1997. This particular era is on sale right now, and you can watch all of them in 4K for $40.
title: This Batman Collection Of 4K Movies Has Gotten A Massive Black Friday Discount

description: More than a decade after the original's release, Alan Wake 2 finally arrived in 2023--and it didn’t disappoint. Our Alan Wake 2 review gave it a stellar 10/10, thanks to a memorable campaign, unique survival-horror mechanics, and somehow living up to the 13 years of hype. Anyone who missed out on the instant classic will now find Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition for $50 (was $80) during Black Friday, the lowest price we’ve ever seen.
title: Save $30 On Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition With This Black Friday Discount

description:
Believe it or not, Steven Spielberg's iconic alien movie E.T. is now more than 40 years old. If someone on your shopping list this holiday loves this classic movie, the limited-edition 4K Blu-ray gift set would make for a great gift. It includes the film, a lunch box, a thermos, and more. This gift set originally retailed for $65, but you can grab it for only $20 during Amazon's Black Friday sale.

See at Amazon
title: E.T. 40th Anniversary 4K Blu-Ray Gift Set Is Only $20 At Amazon

description:
The 2024 release calendar is slowly coming to a close, but there are still games worth paying attention to, especially those flying under the radar. Developed by Unreliable Narrators, Two Falls (Nishu Takuatshina) is a narrative-driven exploration game that presents a story from two perspectives in a way that doesn't happen often, contrasting French and Indigenous first encounters.

Released on November 8, just in time for Native American Heritage Month, Two Falls is set in 17th century Canadian wilderness starring Jeanne, a French King's Daughter stranded from the colonies, and Maikan, a Innu hunter who's trying to uncover the source of trouble in his native forest, land of his ancestors. Firewatch and What Remains of Edith Finch are the main inspirations behind the game.
title: Firewatch-Inspired Game Two Falls Offers Players A Look At Indigenous History

description:
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 has already become one of the most memorable launches of the year, but probably not in the way that developer Asobo Studio hoped. It debuted earlier this week with a number of bugs and performance issues that have left it virtually unplayable for many. Consequently, Flight Simulator 2024 has been review-bombed on Steam. Now, Asobo Studio is attempting to assure players that the team is working "around the clock" to fix it.

In a statement on X, Asobo Studio noted that Flight Simulator 2024's server capacity has been increased, but "access issues continue." Many of the game's issues stem from Asobo underestimating the servers it would need to keep the game running smoothly. The large number of players attempting to access the game
title: Microsoft Flight Sim 2024 Adds More Servers While Team Works "Around The Clock" To Fix Issues

description: The original Epic Mickey hit consoles in 2010, but if you missed out on the 3D platformer back then, today you’ll find its remake, Epic Mickey: Rebrushed, discounted to just $40 (was $60). Best Buy is slashing its price for Black Friday, and since the deal applies to PS5, Switch, and Xbox Series X, there’s no reason to miss out on the family-friendly adventure.
title: Epic Mickey: Rebrushed Is Discounted To $40 For Black Friday

description:
PlayStation's 30th Anniversary Collection releases today, November 21. If you weren't able to preorder the PS5 Slim Digital in classic PlayStation gray, you have another chance today. PlayStation Direct is restocking the PS5 Slim, DualSense Controller, and DualSense Edge Controller at 9 AM PT / 12 PM ET.

Restocking today at 9 AM PT / 12 PM ET:
title: PlayStation Anniversary Collection Restocks At 9 AM PT: PS5 Slim And DualSense Controllers

description: Cyberpunk 2077 wasn't an immediate hit when it was released in 2020, but it’s only grown more enticing over the years. Along with heaps of patches to improve its performance and smooth out gameplay, it received the impressive Phantom Liberty expansion--starring Idris Elba. If you’ve yet to explore Night City, Black Friday is giving you a chance to pick up Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition for just $40 (was $60).
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition Is Just $40 For Black Friday

description:
Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance, the enhanced release of the acclaimed 2021 RPG, has gotten a big discount for Black Friday. The story-rich dungeon crawling RPG is just $25 at Amazon, so you can start fusing demons and making weighty moral choices without breaking the bank.

See at Amazon

This deal covers the standard PS5 and Nintendo Switch versions, as well as the
title: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance Is $25 For Black Friday

description:
From Software has become synonymous with challenging and beautifully crafted action-RPGs, and for Black Friday, you can get the studio's very best game for just $20. Elden Ring typically sells for $60, and while we have seen it discounted several times in the past, this is the best price yet for an incredible adventure that'll test your skills within its elegantly tragic fantasy world.

See at Amazon

Only 29
title: Elden Ring Is Just $20 For Black Friday

description:
For two decades, Valve's Steam has been a dominant platform for PC games. Now, Valve is using its power to write new rules for season passes and DLC sold through Steam. Among the changes, publishers will now have to provide a description for each DLC, as well as a three-month launch window. Publishers will only get to change the DLC date once--within a three-month window beyond the originally scheduled date--without risking Valve stepping in to resolve the situation by potentially refunding players the price of the DLC.

"By offering a season pass, you are promising future content," writes Valve in the newly revised site for Steam partners. "In the process of launching a Season Pass you will be asked to commit to a launch timing for each content release in the season pass. That launch timing is a commitment to both customers and Steam. If you aren't ready to clearly communicate about the content included in eac
title: Steam Outlines Major Changes To Its Season Pass And DLC Rules

description:
Valve is currently working on a sequel to the Steam Controller, along with a controller for its Deckard VR headset, according to spatial computing expert and unofficial Valve oracle Brad Lynch, whose datamining frequently uncovers interesting details on Valve products.

According to Lynch, both the Steam Controller 2 (codenamed "Ibex") and a controller for the currently unconfirmed Deckard VR headset--aptly codenamed "Roy," an homage to Blade Runner's renegade Replicant, Roy Batty--are under development at Valve. Per Lynch, both products are reportedly "being tooled for a mass production goal in [Valve's] factories right now."

"That’s why I know they’re in later stages of productization," Lynch added in a post on Twitter.
title: Steam Controller 2 And New VR Controller Both Reportedly In The Works At Valve

description:
As we enter end-of-the-year award season, superstar Post Malone has revealed his current favorite game--Hunt: Showdown. The musician geeked out about the FPS with the game's creative director, calling it "the best game."

Spotted by PC Gamer, Malone appeared in a video (seen below) with Hunt: Showdown creative director Scott Lussier on the game's YouTube channel. The musician explained that his buddy turned him onto Hunt: Showdown, and he's loved it ever since. "Whenever I'm on the road and can't play, I'm always missing it," Malone said. "And I've got about 400 hours on it."
title: Post Malone Probably Loves Hunt: Showdown More Than You, Has 400 Hours Of Playtime

description:
Like A Dragon: Infinite Wealth is the latest in the beloved RPG series, and the second to star new series protagonist Ichiban Kasuga. If you haven't caught up with the latest misadventures of everyone's favorite big-hearted dumbass, now is a great time, as Amazon has it for $25 (marked down from $70) for Black Friday.

See at Amazon

The Like A Dragon series is the new title for the former Yakuza series, which shifted with the release of Ichiban's debut in Yakuza: Like A Dragon. That game also shifted the series to feature turn-base
title: Like A Dragon: Infinite Wealth Is $25 For Black Friday

description:
Much has been made about Avowed's approach to its setting, the Living Lands, and the fact that it is not an open-world game. Instead, Avowed's world is made up of "open zones"--large geographical areas that are interconnected with other large areas, much like a previous game from developer Obsidian, The Outer Worlds.

At least in the first of Avowed's areas, that means that Obsidian has put a focus on making sure that the entire space provides interesting adventures. Whether you're chasing side quests handed out by random characters populating the Living Lands' biggest city, Paradis, or just rambling through the area to see what's there, there are plenty of rewards for exploration. There are bandit camps, ruins, half-destroyed hovels, and groups of dead soldiers surrounding the corpses of huge bears. The Living Lands is a place dense with sto
title: Avowed Is Full Of Discoveries And The Freedom To Find Them--Or Not

description:
Peter Stormare's popular Call of Duty character The Replacer has built his entire identity around stepping in for people at their jobs so they can play COD. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 took things a step further by lining up The Replacer as a playable in-game operator. So it's only fitting that The Replacer's finishing moves reflect himFFdoing what he does best in an over-the-top manner.

The Replacer's finishing moves have leaked early, and they've been posted on social media. The common theme between each finisher is that just when the player is about to execute their opponent, The Replacer comes in and d
title: Black Ops 6: The Replacer's Leaked Finishing Moves Are Some Of COD's Most Ridiculous Yet

description:
As part of its ongoing overhaul, Star Wars Outlaws will be dropping forced stealth sections from "almost all" parts of the game with its new patch. In a blog post, developer Massive Entertainment outlined these changes, which will allow players to blast their way out of danger when they're discovered by enemies. Frank Reynolds would be proud.

"We know many of you enjoy the stealth approach, so it was important to us to preserve that playstyle while also giving you the freedom to decide how to tackle each mission," Star Wars Outlaws' creative director Drew Rechner wrote in a blog post. "Ultimately, you'll have the choice to sneak, go in combat-first, or--my personal favorite--sneak until you're caught and then blast your way out."
title: Star Wars Outlaws Is Dropping Forced Stealth, So You Can Start Blasting Your Way Out Of Trouble

description:
One year after Netflix brought Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy to its growing mobile-gaming library, two of those games are set to leave the service. Netflix has warned users that they will only have until December 13 to play Grand Theft Auto 3 - The Definitive Edition and Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - The Definitive Edition.

While GTA 3 and Vice City are both set to leave the service, it seems like San Andreas is staying on Netflix for a while longer, with the game not displaying the same "Leaving Soon" card as the other two. According to What's On Netflix, the GTA games were some of the most downloaded in Netflix's library, with San Andreas easily the most popular of the three.

The GTA Trilogy's
title: Two Grand Theft Auto Games Are Leaving Netflix's Game Library Soon

description:
Black Ops 6 Ranked Play is live for those players who want to take on more serious competition following the rules of the Call of Duty League. The ranked competition will reward exclusive cosmetic items to those who reach certain milestones, including an exclusive champion skin that will be awarded only to the player who comes out on top at the end of the season.

Separate to Black Ops 6's Prestige ranks, Ranked Play is designed for the most dedicated players who want to play multiplayer matches with the same settings, maps, modes, and weapon restrictions as COD's official esports league. In order to qualify for Ranked Play, players first have to log 50 wins in match-made multiplayer games to unlock access to the ultra-competitive mode. All wins logged since the game was released count towards t
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Ranked Play Starts Now, Rewards Revealed

description:
Creators and consumers are tangling with the use of generative AI in everything from games to TV-show opening sequences, and the sentiment on AI seems to be shifting. To help consumers make decisions about which games to buy, game storefront Itch.io now requires all creators to disclose the use of generative AI in games, Itch.io founder Leaf Corcoran announced in a forum post to the site.

The text of the post itself is fairly straightforward, directed primarily at the creators who will have to disclose this information.
title: Itch.io Now Requires Creators To Disclose AI-Generated Content

description: For fans of classic sci-fi, there's a great Black Friday deal on right now for the original Battlestar Galactica TV series. First released in 1978, this box set usually retails for $70, but you can get it for just $30. All the episodes have been remastered in 1080p and the aspect ratio has been switched to widescreen, plus there's quite a bit of extra content to watch as well.
title: Battlestar Galactica Remastered Is More Than 50% Off Ahead Of Black Friday

My Hero Academia has been massively popular for several years now, and if you're looking to dive into this anime series, several box sets are on sale for Black Friday. This is the perfect way to check out the series if you're new, and it comes with several extras, like interviews, trailers, artist sketches, and more that long-time fans will enjoy.

If you want to get caught up with Vin Diesel and the rest of the family, or just gift the entire Fast canon to a member of your family, you can snag the entire series on Blu-ray (so far) for around $40-60 for Black Friday.

The 10-movie collection in 4K UHD is now $59
title: Get All 10 Fast & Furious Films For (Around) Fifty Bucks For Black Friday

Better Call Saul, the Breaking Bad prequel TV series, is discounted nicely on Amazon for Black Friday. The online retailer is selling Better Call Saul: The Complete Series on Blu-ray for only $101.50. That's a very nice discount from its normal $216 price point.

This bundle includes all of the Terminator movies on Blu-ray, and each one comes with several spec

The Wire: The Complete Series comes on 20 Blu-ray discs and ships quickly for Prime members. For anyone just catching up, The Wire
title: Get The Wire's Complete Series At A Criminally Low Discount For Black Friday

It’s hard to believe, but South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut and Team America: World Police released on 4K Blu-ray for the first time this June. It took nearly two decades for the hit movies to get the 4K treatment--but just months after their arrival, you’ll find both discounted for Black Friday.

Head over to Amazon to snag South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut (4K UHD) for just $19 (was $26). Along with a 4K copy of the film, you’ll also get Blu-ray and digital copies. You’ll also find a sing-a-long version on the Blu-ray disc, plus special features like commentary from Matt Stone and Trey Parker, along with a music video and theatrical trailers. This is the lowest price ever for the 4K movie, but the discount is only sticking around until
title: Grab The South Park And Team America 4K Blu-Rays For Cheap During Black Friday

description:
The Black Friday shopping bonanza is in full swing, and if you're in the market for The Good Place, we have some... good news for you. Amazon has the NBC TV show's complete series on sale right now on Blu-ray for just $37.50, which is an excellent discount off its normal $70 price point.

The Good Place: The Complete Series comes on nine Blu-ray discs spanning the show's four seasons and 53 total episodes. The show debuted in 2016 and ended in
title: Pick Up The Good Place On Blu-Ray For A Nice Black Friday Discount

description:
The Rocky movies are bona fide classics of the 1970s and '80s, and now you can find them all in one place for cheap. The Rocky Knockout Collection compiles all four original Rocky movies (we don't talk about Rocky V), and the 4K UHD version is now on sale for $37, down from $60, for Black Friday.

See at Amazon

The set includes the first four Rocky films, pitting the Italian Stallion against Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang, and Ivan Drago. In the case of the fourth
title: Rocky Knockout Collection Is Almost Half Off For Black Friday

description:
Black Friday 2024 is upon us, and that means there are numerous deals to be had on Amazon across a number of categories. If you're looking for a TV box set, Amazon has Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! The Complete Series for a great discount. It's selling for $25, which is more than half off its normal $55 price point.

See on Amazon
title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! The Complete Series Has A Great Discount For Black Friday

description:
It's officially the Black Friday shopping season, and there are deals galore on Amazon. One such offer is a nice discount on Universal's Despicable Me movie series, which you can pick up in a four-movie collection--and that's all of them--that's currently on sale for only $33. That's a nice discount over its usual $50 price point.

See on Amazon

The Despicable Me 4-Movie collection incl
title: The Despicable Me Four-Movie Collection Is Discounted In Amazon's Black Friday Sale

description:
Looking to add a heap of new films to your collection for cheap? Then check out these four WB 100th Anniversary 25-Film Collections, which compile some of the best Warner Bros. movies of the past several decades. Typically sold for $150, the premium collections are available for just $50 each during Black Friday. The discounted collections include Volume One: Award Winners; Volume Two: Comedy, Drama, Musicals; Volume Three: Fantasy, Action, Adventure; and Volume Four: Thrillers, Sci-Fi, and Horror.

Each box contains 25 movies on Blu-ray disc and digital download, along with commemorative packaging, collectible WB shield pins, and a booklet with original posters and production
title: The Giant Warner Bros. 25-Film Collections Are Just $50 At Amazon Right Now

description:
Over at Amazon, you can get a big Black Friday discount on the Sailor Moon Crystal anime series. There are three Blu-ray sets in total--Dark Kingdom, Black Moon, and Death Busters--and while each one would normally cost $80, you can get them for $30 each during Black Friday.

Sailor Moon Crystal Black Friday Deals
title: The Sailor Moon Crystal Anime Series Is Steeply Discounts At Amazon

description: The Holiday Season is almost upon us, and there's no better time to sit back, relax, and lose several days by binging on anime. For Black Friday, you can save quite a few bucks on several Tokyo Ghoul Blu-rays, as these anime collections have gotten a nice discount. The first season is on sale for $28.50 at Amazon, and both parts of the sequel series Tokyo Ghoul: re are available for under $40 each.
title: Tokyo Ghoul Blu-Rays Get Big Discount For Black Friday

description:
Amazon is discounting a long list of Pokemon Blu-rays and DVDs for Black Friday, some of which are down to their best prices of the year. Surprisingly, not many Pokemon seasons have made the jump to Blu-ray, and you’ll notice that most of the offers are for simple DVDs. But if you’re looking to add to your collection, it’s hard to beat these rock-bottom prices.

Ash recently wrapped up his decades-long quest to be the very best, and you can relive the finale with Pokemon The Series: Ultimate Journeys (DVD). Amazon is slashing it to just 30 (was $60), which is its lowest price ever. The six-disc set includes 54 episodes, and while it’s light on special features, it’s still the ideal way to check out the Ash’s epic finale. And now that it’s just $30, it’s easier to recommend than ever before.

Other notable deals include
title: Tons Of Pokemon Blu-Rays And DVDs Are Discounted For Black Friday
